solution_line_template: He has {num_pairs} pairs of shoes and each pair is made of {shoes_per_pair} individual shoes for a total of {num_pairs}*{shoes_per_pair} = <<{num_pairs}*{shoes_per_pair}={total_shoes}>>{total_shoes} shoes

He has already polished {percent_polished_num}% of the {total_shoes} individual shoes so he has polished {percent_polished_decimal}*{total_shoes} = <<{percent_polished_num}*{percent_factor}*{total_shoes}={polished_shoes}>>{polished_shoes} shoes
He has {total_shoes} shoes and has already polished {polished_shoes} shoes so he has {total_shoes}-{polished_shoes} = <<{total_shoes}-{polished_shoes}={shoes_left}>>{shoes_left} more shoes to polish
